https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Swedish filmmaker Jon Thunqvist has spent four years following the birth of Ikea, one of the world's most popular furniture and home accessories store, from the start of its negotiations and construction until the inauguration of its Japan branch in Chiba. A Sofa for a Samurai
